name: Garbage Truck Parking Simulator 3D USA Street Race
name_original: Garbage Truck Parking Simulator 3D USA Street Race
description:
Get ready to get dirty!! It's time to get behind the wheel of a garbage truck! You are a new recruit hired to clean up the streets of a small town. It's your first day on the job, and you're driving this big truck with your boss. Think of it as the last day of garbage truck driving school! Clean up the streets, and the job is yours! Good luck!

HOW TO PLAY

1) Find all the garbage that requires pick up. These areas will be flashing green. Once you arrive at the collection point, stop your truck and you'll see a green circle fill up. Now move onto the next location.

2) Once you pick up all the trash, you then have to go park your garbage truck on a special parking zone.

PRO TIP! Use the map on the top left of the screen.

FEATURES

- All garbage trucks unlocked!
- Two games in one! Pick up the trash and then park your truck!
- Awesome super HD 3D graphics!
- Multiple steering options.
- Multiple camera views.
- Complete tutorial provided.

Any questions? Contact us at support@juuq.com.
